fields.headline: Annotated solutions for Genius 181
fields.bodyText: * Definitions in these 10 clues indicate solutions that are one letter too long for the grid; their wordplay leads to the solutions required for the grid entry. (All are real words.) Clockwise from the top, these surplus letters spell: OFF THE GRID. Across 1 adaptor APT on AD + OR 5 flatter F  R(rance) 9* after [D] + (brexi)T in FEAR (anag) 10 last thing LAST + THING (anag) 11 timidly MIT(rev)/ID/L(iterall)Y [Cambridge, Mass] 12 enraged A(bout) GENDER (anag) 13 extremism RE in M(alcolm)/X’S/TIME (anag) 15* forgo F  O[T] 17* deals [I]DE  S [Desmond Tutu] 19 panoramic PAN  IC 21 accords AC(e)/CORDS 23 reissue double def 24 grumbling GRU  B/LING 25* heart HATRE(d) (anag) + [H] 26 entente (t)EN/TEN/TE(n) 27 lasagna LA  N(orth)/A(merica) Down 1 apartheid DITHER (anag) after APA(ce) 2 attempt ATTE(s/MP)T 3 tiredness RESIDENTS (anag) 4* rally [O]R(esistance)/ALLY 5 fisherman FI(ll)/SHERMAN 6* alter [F](re)AL TER(ms) (hidden) 7 trigger T<(troublemake)R>IGGER [Pooh’s friend] 8* rigid [F]RIGID 14 impassive I(pswich)/M  ASSIVE 15 furnishes F  ISHES 16 orchestra STARE (anag) after (t)ORCH 18 account A  UNT 20 mustang must ’ang (hom) [relative of horse drawing hackney coach] 21* angle double def [R] 22* robin ROB/IN[G] 23* regal RE
